forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 68 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 13 to 24 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 58. West southwest wind 12 to 23 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph.

weather_report:
The scene in Downtown San Francisco unfolds under a mostly sunny sky, with a gentle warmth lingering in the air that hints at a pleasant afternoon to come. The temperature floats around a comfortable 70 degrees, while a mild breeze dances through the streets, stirring the city’s energy. As the day progresses, expect a slight dip—down to about 68 with the sunlight gradually retreating into the embrace of the evening clouds. 

Tonight, a blanket of mostly gray clouds will settle overhead, curling in with a nocturnal hush and bringing the temperature down to a cozy 58. There’s an easy-to-miss hint of fog tracing the edges of the city, the faintest sign of the marine layer that will whisper along the coast as the night deepens. Given this lovely yet uncertain warmth, dressing in layers is wise; a light sweater or perhaps a chic jacket will serve you well as you wander the streets, whether you're perusing a quiet bookstore or enjoying a bite at a local café. This afternoon invites exploration, perfect for a leisurely stroll along the waterfront or a visit to one of the city’s many parks, where the balmy breeze and the sound of the waves can harmonize with the hum of the day.
